Name: Core Passive: Demolition Hammer
Additional Ability: Belobog Management
Descriptions: When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>30%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When the explosion from Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, it applies a debuff to the target. While the target is Stunned, all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> deal 35% more DMG to the target. This effect can stack up to 2 times and resets when the Stunned effect ends.

When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>35%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When the explosion from Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, it applies a debuff to the target. While the target is Stunned, all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> deal 35% more DMG to the target. This effect can stack up to 2 times and resets when the Stunned effect ends.

When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>40%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When the explosion from Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, it applies a debuff to the target. While the target is Stunned, all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> deal 35% more DMG to the target. This effect can stack up to 2 times and resets when the Stunned effect ends.

When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>45%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When the explosion from Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, it applies a debuff to the target. While the target is Stunned, all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> deal 35% more DMG to the target. This effect can stack up to 2 times and resets when the Stunned effect ends.

When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When the explosion from Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, it applies a debuff to the target. While the target is Stunned, all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> deal 35% more DMG to the target. This effect can stack up to 2 times and resets when the Stunned effect ends.

When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>55%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When the explosion from Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, it applies a debuff to the target. While the target is Stunned, all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> deal 35% more DMG to the target. This effect can stack up to 2 times and resets when the Stunned effect ends.

When Koleda uses her <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or consumes <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use an enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the Daze she deals increases by <color=#2BAD00>60%</color>.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When the explosion from Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, it applies a debuff to the target. While the target is Stunned, all squad members' <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attacks</color> deal 35% more DMG to the target. This effect can stack up to 2 times and resets when the Stunned effect ends.

Cons.Name: Beat of the Hammer
Cons.Effect: After the 2nd or 4th hit of Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> or her enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, quickly use a <color=#FFFFFF>Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> to increase the Daze dealt by 15%.

Cons.Name: Kinetic Recovery
Cons.Effect: When Koleda's <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, she recovers 60 Energy. Can trigger once every 45s.

Cons.Name: Furnace's Glow
Cons.Effect: Koleda gains one stack of Charge (max 2 stacks) when consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Furnace Fire</color> to use her Enhanced <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>. When her <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> hits an enemy, she consumes all stacks of Charge to increase the attack's DMG by 18% per stack.

Cons.Name: Saturated Blast
Cons.Effect: When <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> triggers an explosion that hits an enemy, it deals additional DMG equal to 360% of Koleda's ATK.
